author: Daniel Pearson
title: Nintendo Left a Secret Message in Its Switch Pro Controller
text:
Nintendo is still on a charm offensive. Not content with bringing out all the feels with a slew of retro console rereleases , the Japanese electronics and video games company has now left a sweet little secret message on its Switch Pro Controller.
Yes, the controller for Nintendo’s latest console contains tiny text reading “thx2 allgamefans!” The message isn’t so easy to find, however — you’ll need to tilt the Switch Pro controller’s right thumb stick down, wiggle it around a bit, then push the stick in until it clicks. That should, in the right light, show the message.
If you still can’t find it, let Japanese Twitter users @y_beat and @geo_stream show you how:
switchのproコンの右スティック周りの透明な部分から見える奥の方に
「thx2 allgamefans!」（すべてのゲームファンに感謝！）て書いてある… #nintendoswitch pic.twitter.com/2oHfShIw5w
